actors.name: Elijah Wood
actors.biography: Elijah Wood is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Frodo Baggins in the Lord of the Rings film trilogy, for which he has been nominated for several awards. He has also appeared in other successful films such as Sin City, Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind and The Last Witch Hunter.

actors.name: Ian McKellen
actors.biography: Ian McKellen is an English actor and theater director. He is best known for his roles in films such as The Lord of the Rings, X-Men and The Hobbit film series, and for his stage work, he is a multiple award-winning actor, including six Laurence Olivier Awards, a Tony Award, a Golden Globe Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, a BIF Award, two Saturn Awards, four Drama Desk Awards, and two Critics' Choice Awards.

actors.name: Viggo Mortensen
actors.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Viggo Mortensen is an American actor, poet, and painter. He is best known for his role as Aragorn in the Lord of the Rings film trilogy. He has also appeared in other successful films such as A History of Violence, Eastern Promises and Captain Fantastic. He is also an accomplished poet and painter, and has published several books of poetry and photography.

actors.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
actors.biography: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor, producer, and environmental activist. He has been nominated for six Academy Awards, and in 2016 won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in The Revenant. He is known for starring in films such as Titanic, The Departed, Inception, The Wolf of Wall Street, and The Great Gatsby among others.

actors.name: Tom Hardy
actors.biography: Tom Hardy is an English actor and producer. He is best known for his roles in films such as Inception, The Dark Knight Rises, and Mad Max: Fury Road. He has also appeared in successful films such as Dunkirk, Venom, and The Revenant. He has been nominated for numerous awards, including the BAFTA Rising Star Award.

actors.name: Ellen Page
actors.biography: Ellen Page is a Canadian actress and producer. She first gained recognition for her role in the film Hard Candy, and later received critical acclaim for her role as the title character in Juno, for which she received an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress. She has also appeared in other successful films such as Inception and The East.

actors.name: Tom Hanks
actors.biography: Tom Hanks is an American actor, producer, and director. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest actors of all time. He has won two Academy Awards, for his roles in Philadelphia and Forrest Gump. He has also appeared in many other successful films such as Saving Private Ryan, Catch Me If You Can, and The Terminal among others.

actors.name: Robin Wright
actors.biography: Robin Wright is an American actress, director, and producer. She gained international recognition for her role as Princess Buttercup in the film The Princess Bride. She is also known for her role as Jenny Curran in Forrest Gump and as Claire Underwood in the Netflix series House of Cards. She has been nominated for several awards throughout her career, including the Golden Globe and Emmy award.

actors.name: Gary Sinise
actors.biography: Gary Sinise is an American actor, director, and musician. He is best known for his portrayal of Lieutenant Dan Taylor in Forrest Gump, for which he was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. He has also appeared in many other successful films such as Apollo 13, Ransom, and The Green Mile among others. He has also had a successful career as a stage actor, and is the founder of the Gary Sinise Foundation which supports veterans and first responders.

actors.name: Edward Norton
actors.biography: Edward Norton is an American actor, director, and producer. He has been nominated for three Academy Awards, and won a Golden Globe award for his role in the film American History X. He is known for his roles in films such as Fight Club, The Illusionist, The Grand Budapest Hotel, and The Incredible Hulk among others. He is also a social activist, and has been involved in several environmental and humanitarian causes.

actors.name: Clint Eastwood
actors.biography: Clint Eastwood is an American actor, director, and producer. He has been in the film industry for over six decades and is considered one of the most iconic actors in Hollywood history. He is best known for his roles in the Dirty Harry series, and for his Western roles in films such as The Good, the Bad and the Ugly, A Fistful of Dollars, and Unforgiven among others. He has also directed and produced many successful films, and has been awarded numerous accolades throughout his career.

actors.name: Eli Wallach
actors.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Eli Wallach was an American actor. He is considered one of the greatest character actors in American film history. He is best known for his roles in films such as The Magnificent Seven, The Good, the Bad and the Ugly, The Misfits, and The Godfather Part III among others. He has been nominated for several awards throughout his career, including an Emmy

actors.name: Lee Van Cleef
actors.biography: Lee Van Cleef was an American actor. He is best known for his roles in Spaghetti Westerns, particularly in films such as The Good, the Bad and the Ugly, For a Few Dollars More, and The Big Gundown. He has also appeared in many other films, including Escape from New York, and The Great Silence. He has been nominated for several awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Henry Fonda
actors.biography: Henry Fonda was an American actor. He appeared in more than 90 films over a 35-year career, including The Grapes of Wrath, 12 Angry Men, and On Golden Pond. He received an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in On Golden Pond and was nominated for Best Actor in The Grapes of Wrath and Mister Roberts. He has also received BAFTA, Golden Globe and Tony awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Lee J. Cobb
actors.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Lee J. Cobb was an American actor. He is best known for his roles in films such as On the Waterfront, 12 Angry Men, and The Exorcist, and for his portrayal of Willy Loman in the original stage production of Arthur Miller's Death of a Salesman, for which he won a Tony Award. He has been nominated for several awards throughout his career, including the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in On the Waterfront.

actors.name: Christian Bale
actors.biography: Christian Bale is a Welsh actor, known for his versatility in a wide range of roles. He has received critical acclaim for his performances in films such as American Psycho, The Fighter, and The Dark Knight trilogy. He won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in The Fighter and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Heath Ledger
actors.biography: Heath Ledger was an Australian actor. He is best known for his role as the Joker in The Dark Knight, for which he posthumously won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. He has also appeared in other successful films such as Brokeback Mountain, and the Four Feathers. He passed away in 2008 at the age of 28, but his legacy lives on through his performances and his iconic role as the Joker.

actors.name: Marlon Brando
actors.biography: Marlon Brando was an American actor and film director. He is widely considered one of the greatest actors of all time. He is best known for his roles in films such as A Streetcar Named Desire, On the Waterfront, and The Godfather. He has won two Academy Awards for Best Actor, for On the Waterfront and The Godfather, and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Al Pacino
actors.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Al Pacino is an American actor and filmmaker. He is best known for his roles in films such as The Godfather trilogy, Scarface, and Dog Day Afternoon. He has won an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Scent of a Woman, and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career. He is widely considered one of the greatest actors of all time.

actors.name: Tim Robbins
actors.biography: Tim Robbins is an American actor, director, and producer. He is best known for his roles in films such as The Shawshank Redemption, Mystic River, and Dead Man Walking. He has won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Mystic River and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career. He is also known for his political activism and his work as a director and producer.

actors.name: Keanu Reeves
actors.biography: Keanu Reeves is a Canadian actor, director, and producer. He is best known for his roles in films such as The Matrix trilogy, Speed, and John Wick. He has been nominated for several awards throughout his career and has also made a name for himself as a philanthropist.

actors.name: Laurence Fishburne
actors.biography: Laurence Fishburne is an American actor, director, and producer. He is best known for his roles in films such as Apocalypse Now, The Matrix Reloaded, and Mystic River. He has been nominated for several awards throughout his career and also has received a Tony Award for his role in Two Trains Running.

actors.name: Carrie-Anne Moss
actors.biography: Carrie-Anne Moss is a Canadian actress. She is best known for her role as Trinity in the Matrix film series. She has also appeared in other successful films such as Memento, Disturbia and The Soft Kill. She has been nominated for several awards throughout her career.

actors.name: Robert De Niro
actors.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Robert De Niro is an American actor, director and producer. He is widely considered one of the greatest actors of all time. He is best known for his roles in films such as The Godfather Part II, Taxi Driver, and Raging Bull. He has won two Academy Awards for Best Actor, for The Godfather Part II and Raging Bull, and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Ray Liotta
actors.biography: Ray Liotta is an American actor, best known for his portrayal of Henry Hill in Goodfellas, for which he was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor, and for his role in Field of Dreams. He has also appeared in other successful films such as Cop Land, and Blow. He has been nominated for several awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Joe Pesci
actors.biography: Joe Pesci is an American actor and musician. He is best known for his roles in films such as Raging Bull, Goodfellas, and Casino. He has won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Goodfellas and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career. He has also released several albums as a musician. He is known for his dynamic performances and versatility

actors.name: Jack Nicholson
actors.biography: Jack Nicholson is an American actor, director, and producer. He is widely considered one of the greatest actors of all time. He is best known for his roles in films such as One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Chinatown and The Shining. He has won three Academy Awards for Best Actor, for One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, As Good as It Gets and Terms of Endearment and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career.

actors.name: Louise Fletcher
actors.biography: Louise Fletcher is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Nurse Ratched in the film One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, for which she won an Academy Award for Best Actress. She has also appeared in other successful films such as Brainstorm and Cruel Intentions 2. She has been nominated for several awards throughout her career.

actors.name: Will Sampson
actors.biography: Will Sampson was an American actor and painter. He was best known for his role as Chief Bromden in One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, for which he was nominated for a Golden Globe award. He also appeared in other successful films such as The White Buffalo and The Outlaw Josey Wales, He is also known as a painter and his work was exhibited in galleries and museums.

actors.name: Toshiro Mifune
actors.biography: Toshiro Mifune was a Japanese actor who appeared in over 150 films. He is considered one of the greatest actors in the history of Japanese cinema. He is best known for his roles in films such as Rashomon, Seven Samurai and Throne of Blood. He worked with director Akira Kurosawa in 16 films and his performances are considered iconic in Japan and around the world.

actors.name: Takashi Shimura
actors.biography: Takashi Shimura was a Japanese actor. He appeared in over 200 films and television series, and is best known for his roles in films such as Rashomon, Seven Samurai and Throne of Blood. He is considered one of the greatest actors in the history of Japanese cinema and worked with director Akira Kurosawa in several films.

actors.name: Brad Pitt
actors.biography: Brad Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He is considered one of the biggest movie stars in the world and has appeared in many successful films such as Fight Club, Troy, and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. He has won several awards throughout his career, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Once Upon a Time in Hollywood.

actors.name: Morgan Freeman
actors.biography: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, narrator and film producer. He has appeared in many successful films such as Million Dollar Baby, The Shawshank Redemption and Batman Begins. He has won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Million Dollar Baby and has been nominated for several other awards throughout his career. He is also known for his deep and distinctive voice, which he frequently uses as a narrator.

actors.name: Gwyneth Paltrow
actors.biography: Gwyneth Paltrow is an American actress, singer, and entrepreneur. She is best known for her roles in films such as Shakespeare in Love, which won her an Academy Award for Best Actress, Iron Man and The Royal Tenenbaums. She has been nominated for several awards throughout her career. She is also known for her lifestyle brand, Goop, which she founded in 2008.

actors.name: Tom Cruise
actors.biography: Tom Cruise is an American actor and producer who has starred in some of the most successful films of all time. He is best known for his roles in the Mission: Impossible film series and Jerry Maguire, and has received numerous awards and nominations for his work.

actors.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
actors.biography: Leonardo DiCaprio is an American actor and producer who has won numerous awards for his performances on film. He is best known for his roles in Titanic, The Departed, and Inception, and has been nominated for several Academy Awards.

actors.name: Matt Damon
actors.biography: Matt Damon is an American actor and screenwriter who has won critical acclaim for his performances on film. He is best known for his roles in Good Will Hunting, The Bourne Identity film series, and The Martian, and has received several awards and nominations for his work.

actors.name: Jodie Foster
actors.biography: Jodie Foster is an American actress and director who has won numerous awards for her work in film. She is best known for her roles in The Silence of the Lambs, Taxi Driver, and Little Man Tate, and has been nominated for several Academy Awards.

actors.name: Gary Oldman
actors.biography: Gary Oldman is an English actor and producer who is known for his chameleonic ability to disappear into a wide range of characters, from Sid Vicious to Winston Churchill.

actors.name: Michael Clarke Duncan
actors.biography: Michael Clarke Duncan was an American actor, best known for his role as John Coffey in The Green Mile (1999), for which he was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. He also appeared in several other films, including Armageddon (1998), The Whole Nine Yards (2000), and Daredevil (2003). Duncan was known for his deep, distinctive voice and towering stature, and was considered one of the most powerful presences on screen.

actors.name: Hugh Jackman
actors.biography: Hugh Jackman is an Australian actor, singer, and producer. He is best known for his role as Wolverine in the X-Men film series (2000-2018), for which he received widespread recognition and critical acclaim. Jackman has also appeared in several other successful films, including Kate & Leopold (2001), Van Helsing (2004), and The Prestige (2006). In addition to his acting career, Jackman is a talented performer and has won Tony Awards for his roles in The Boy from Oz (2003) and Broadway's The River (2014).

actors.name: Emma Stone
actors.biography: Emma Stone is an American actress known for her versatility and charming performances in a variety of film genres. She rose to fame in the early 2010s with her roles in comedies like 'Easy A' and musicals like 'La La Land.' Over the years, she has established herself as one of the most talented and sought-after actresses in Hollywood.

actors.name: Andrew Garfield
actors.biography: Andrew Garfield is an American-British actor who has made a name for himself in both Hollywood and the UK. He first gained recognition for his role in the film 'The Social Network' and went on to star in the Spider-Man franchise. He is known for his intense and nuanced performances, and has received critical acclaim for his work.

actors.name: Tilda Swinton
actors.biography: Tilda Swinton is a Scottish actress who has made a name for herself in the independent film world. She is known for her quirky and eclectic roles in films like 'The Chronicles of Narnia' and 'Doctor Strange.' She has received numerous awards and accolades for her work, and is widely regarded as one of the most talented and innovative actresses working today.

actors.name: Emily Blunt
actors.biography: Emily Olivia Leah Blunt is an English actress. She is the recipient of several awards, including a Golden Globe Award, and has been nominated for two British Academy Film Awards.

actors.name: Saoirse Ronan
actors.birthplace: The Bronx, New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Saoirse Una Ronan is an Irish and American actress. She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in the 2007 film Atonement, and has since received two other Academy Award nominations.

actors.name: Ewan McGregor
actors.biography: Ewan McGregor is a Scottish actor and director known for his roles in films such as 'Trainspotting', 'Moulin Rouge!', and the 'Star Wars' prequel trilogy. He has received numerous award nominations and has won several awards, including a Golden Globe for his performance in 'Fargo' television series. McGregor has also lent his voice to various animated films, including the lead character in the English version of 'Valiant'. Throughout his career, McGregor has been known for his versatility, adapting easily to different genres and styles.

actors.name: Uma Thurman
actors.biography: Uma Thurman is an American actress and model who is best known for her role as the 'Bride' in the 'Kill Bill' films. She has received critical acclaim for her work in films such as 'Pulp Fiction', 'Gattaca', and 'Les Misérables'. Thurman has received several award nominations, including a BAFTA nomination for her role in 'Dangerous Liaisons' and a Golden Globe nomination for her performance in 'Hysterical Blindness'. Thurman has also been recognized for her contributions to the film industry, receiving a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

actors.name: Cate Blanchett
actors.biography: Cate Blanchett is an Australian actress known for her versatile acting skills and her ability to bring depth and nuance to her roles. She has received numerous accolades, including two Academy Awards, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, and three Golden Globe Awards. Blanchett has also been recognized for her work in the theater, receiving several awards for her performances on stage. Some of her notable film roles include 'Elizabeth', 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy, 'The Curious Case of Benjamin Button', and 'Thor: Ragnarok'. Throughout her career, Blanchett has been known for her elegance and poise, both on and off screen.

actors.name: Natalie Portman
actors.biography: Natalie Portman is an Academy Award-winning actress, film producer, and director. Born in Jerusalem, she moved to the United States when she was three years old. Portman is best known for her role as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel trilogy, for which she received critical acclaim. She has also appeared in several independent films, including The Professional, Garden State, and Closer. In 2010, Portman won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in Black Swan.

actors.name: Meryl Streep
actors.biography: Meryl Streep is a multi-award-winning actress, widely regarded as one of the greatest actresses of all time. She has been nominated for the Academy Award 21 times, and has won three times, for her performances in Kramer vs. Kramer, Sophie's Choice, and The Iron Lady. Streep has also won several Golden Globe Awards, and has been awarded several honorary degrees. She has appeared in many films, including The Devil Wears Prada, Doubt, and Julie & Julia, and is considered one of the greatest interpreters of the works of William Shakespeare.

actors.name: Kate Winslet
actors.biography: Kate Elizabeth Winslet is an English actress. She has received numerous awards and nominations, including three Academy Award nominations, and has won three BAFTA Awards, a Grammy Award, and a Primetime Emmy Award. She is best known for her roles in the films Sense and Sensibility, Titanic, and The Reader.

actors.name: Robert Downey Jr.
actors.birthplace: New York City, New York, USA
actors.biography: Robert Downey Jr. is an American actor and producer who made his film debut in the movie 'Pound' in 1970. He is best known for his role as Tony Stark / Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, a role he reprised in several movies including 'The Avengers' and 'Iron Man.' Downey Jr. received critical acclaim for his performance in the film 'Chaplin' and was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor. He has won several awards for his roles in 'Tropic Thunder,' 'The Judge,' and 'Iron Man 3.' Downey Jr. is considered one of the highest-grossing actors of all time and continues to be one of Hollywood's most sought-after leading men.

actors.name: Emma Watson
actors.biography: Emma Watson is a British actress best known for her role as Hermione Granger in the Harry Potter film series. She was born on April 15, 1990 in Paris, France. Watson has also starred in several other films, including Beauty and the Beast, The Perks of Being a Wallflower, and Little Women. In addition to her acting career, Watson is also an activist, advocating for women's rights and equality. She is 5' 5", tall."

actors.name: Jeremy Irons
actors.biography: Jeremy Irons is a British actor best known for his roles in the films Reversal of Fortune, The Lion King, and Die Hard with a Vengeance. He was born on September 19, 1948 in Cowes, Isle of Wight, England. Irons has also appeared in numerous stage productions and has done voice work for animated films. He is 6' 1",tall.
